duties_responsibilities.duty: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Functional Consultant SCM, (F & O) to deliver the following to our clients and teammates:Strong Product knowledge in PO,INV, OM, Adv Warehouse etcAbility to understand Customer requirements and provide solutionAbility to conduct workshops • Write design documentation and corresponding functional specifications.• Meet with Software Developers to communicate technical specifications• Write test scenarios and cases and perform testing.• Work on a team with Lead Solutions Architect and Functional, and Technical Consultant to provide Microsoft Dynamics Enterprise

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
